test.name: CP01 - Registro de un Usuario

kw.name: Generate Random String
kw.doc: Generates a string with a desired ``length`` from the given ``chars``.

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: POST
kw.msg: POST Request : url=https://practice.expandtesting.com/notes/api/users/register path_url=/notes/api/users/register headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.32.5', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Length': '79', 'Content-Type': 'application/json'} body=b'{"name": "Claudia", "email": "clau_930495@gmail.com", "password": "Control123"}'
kw.doc: Sends a POST request.

kw.name: Should Be Equal
kw.doc: Fails if the given objects are unequal.

kw.name: Should Be True
kw.doc: Fails if the given condition is not true.

kw.name: Should Not Be Empty
kw.doc: Verifies that the given item is not empty.

kw.name: Should Be Equal
kw.doc: Fails if the given objects are unequal.

kw.name: Should Be Equal
kw.doc: Fails if the given objects are unequal.

test.doc: Verifica que se registra un usuario nuevo y devuelva 201 con datos correctos.

test.name: CP02 - User Login

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: POST
kw.msg: POST Request : url=https://practice.expandtesting.com/notes/api/users/login path_url=/notes/api/users/login headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.32.5', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Length': '60', 'Content-Type': 'application/json'} body=b'{"email": "clau_980518@gmail.com", "password": "Control123"}'
kw.doc: Sends a POST request.

kw.name: Should Be Equal
kw.doc: Fails if the given objects are unequal.

kw.name: Should Be True
kw.doc: Fails if the given condition is not true.

kw.name: Should Not Be Empty
kw.doc: Verifies that the given item is not empty.

kw.name: Should Be Equal
kw.doc: Fails if the given objects are unequal.

kw.name: Should Be Equal
kw.doc: Fails if the given objects are unequal.

kw.name: Should Not Be Empty
kw.doc: Verifies that the given item is not empty.

test.doc: Verifica que un POST a /users/login devuelve datos usuario y token.
